content: picacho peak is a lightweight all-over lace hat it is great for those cool spring mornings or evenings when you want just a little something to break the chill **yarn** the plucky knitter primo fingering 75% merino 20% cashmere 5% nylon 4 ply 385yds/100g or your favorite fingering weight yarn * 205yds/188m used in sample * colorway steelcut **sizing** * 20 / 51cm circumference blocked **needles and notions** * us 3 3 25mm 16 /40 cm circular needles * us 4 3 5mm 16 /40cm circular needles * us 4 3 5mm dpns * 8 removable markers 1 which is different from the others to mark the beginning of the round * tapestry needle
